# Nukes in Russia {#sec-nukes-russia}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
NATO threatened Russia with nukes close to its border.
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=(nato%7Cus)%20(nukes%7Cnuclear)%20russia&sort=relevance)

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
NATO deployed air defenses against Iranian medium-range missiles in Poland. 
Russia deployed short-range nuclear weapons in Kaliningrad.
